name: S.H.Figuarts  HARDBOILDER (FUUTO PI ANIMATED ANNIVERSARY)
description:
S.H. Figuarts HARDBOILDER is now available with newly sculpted effect parts to commemorate the anime adaptation of "Fuuto PI"!
										This figure features renewed body coloring for the "S.H.Figuarts HARDBOILDER" which was released in 2016. The rear back unit has been changed to a vivid metallic green color to match with the "S.H.Figuarts (SHINKOCCHOU SEIHOU) KAMEN RIDER W CYCLONE JOKER (FUUTO PI ANIMATED ANNIVERSARY)" (sold separately).
The rear back unit features metallic green coloring with different brightness levels for the top and bottom parts. Additionally, the exhaust pipe and license plate areas have been given a darker green color than the rest of the body. The license plate also recreates the "Fuuto Number" that you can see in the anime.

Newly sculpted smoke effect parts are included as well. The smoke that arises from the friction between the tires and the ground has been recreated in dynamic shaping, inspired by the anime. This lets you enjoy displays that capture the excitement of racing through Shadow Fuuto.

Pair it with the "S.H.Figuarts (SHINKOCCHOU SEIHOU) KAMEN RIDER W CYCLONE JOKER (FUUTO PI ANIMATED ANNIVERSARY)" (sold separately), and you can recreate the animation-style effect of his scarf fluttering wildly in the air as he rides.

You can also pair it with the "S.H.Figuarts (SHINKOCCHOU SEIHOU) KAMEN RIDER W CYCLONE SKULL" (sold separately) to recreate the action of Kamen Rider W Cyclone Skull from the film "Fuuto PI: The Portrait of Kamen Rider Skull".
